site_name: Development Site at, 197-205 Brompton Road, LONDON
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 16/08564 (Amalgamation of five shop units at basement and ground floors and change of use from office (Class B1) to shop (Class A1) use at first and second floor levels to create one flagship store; installation of main entrance on Brompton Road facade, corner entrance on junction of Brompton Road and Ovington Gardens and secondary entrances to Ovington Gardens and Yeoman's Row facades; installation of lift in rear service yard, and other associated works.) to allow installation of a shutter door with security lights on either side, leading from lift core to rear service yard, and the relocation of the approved plant 'zone'.
